trans-unit.source: Specifies processing rules or option settings for the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"></xref> XAML reader implementation.
trans-unit.target: Angir behandlingen av regler eller innstillingene for den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"> </xref> XAML leseren implementering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"></xref> class by copying settings from an existing <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"> </xref> klassen ved å kopiere innstillinger fra en eksisterende <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"></xref> object to copy.
trans-unit.target: Den eksisterende <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings"> </xref> objektet du vil kopiere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the underlying stream or text reader should be closed when the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den underliggende dataflyt eller tekst leseren, må lukkes når det <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying stream or reader should be closed when the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"></xref> is closed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det underliggende dataflyten eller leseren må lukkes når det <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"> </xref> er lukket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the reader should differ from the default <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"></xref> behavior of how markup compatibility content is processed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om leseren må være forskjellig fra standard <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"> </xref> virkemåte for hvordan markup kompatibilitet innhold behandles.

trans-unit.source: The default handling behavior for XML markup compatibility in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader> is that the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>, as provided for initialization, is wrapped in a created internal helper class.
trans-unit.target: Standard behandler virkemåte for XML-markup kompatibilitet i <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>er som <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>som er oppgitt for initialisering, er omsluttet av en opprettet internt helper klasse.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This helper class reads the markup compatibility nodes separately and enters into the nodes based on markup compatibility of the schema context.
trans-unit.target: Denne hjelperklasse leser koden kompatibilitet noder separat og skriver inn i noder basert på markup kompatibilitet av skjema-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: Suggested scenarios for setting SkipXmlCompatibilityProcessing to `true` are: - You want to keep any markup compatibility content in the primary XAML stream.
trans-unit.target: Foreslått scenarier for sette SkipXmlCompatibilityProcessing til `true` er:-du vil beholde markup kompatibilitet innhold i primær XAML dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: - You have already processed the markup compatibility because you are using a reader that can process markup compatibility content inline.
trans-unit.target: -Du har allerede behandlet markup kompatibilitetsnivå fordi du bruker en leser som kan behandle markup kompatibilitet innhold internt.

trans-unit.source: - You choose to ignore XML compatibility conventions in your XAML reader implementation for reasons of performance.
trans-unit.target: -Du velger å ignorere XML-kompatibilitet konvensjoner i XAML leseren implementeringen din grunner av ytelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the initiating reader is directly used, which means that XML compatibility markup is processed as part of the main stream and compatibility is not considered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den første leseren brukes direkte, som betyr at XML-kompatibilitet kode behandles som en del av den primære dataflyten og regnes ikke kompatibilitetsnivået.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the default behavior is used, which processes XML compatibility separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis det brukes standard virkemåte, som behandler XML-kompatibilitet separat.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the language setting value that the reader may promote to writers that write <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:lang" name="xml:lang" href=""></xref> attributes in nodes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som leseren kan hever for språkinnstilling til skrivere skrive <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:lang" name="xml:lang" href=""> </xref> attributter i noder.

trans-unit.source: The caller is responsible for making sure that the string you provide is appropriate for `xml:lang` usage.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren er ansvarlig for å sørge for at strengen du oppgi er riktig for `xml:lang` bruk.

trans-unit.source: The string to use for possible <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:lang" name="xml:lang" href=""></xref> output that is based on the reader.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som skal brukes for mulige <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:lang" name="xml:lang" href=""> </xref> utdata som er basert på leseren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the XAML reader instructs any XAML writers to write <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:space" name="xml:space" href=""></xref> attributes in nodes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om XAML leseren instruerer eventuelle XAML forfattere å skrive <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:space" name="xml:space" href=""> </xref> attributter i noder.

trans-unit.source: If that behavior is desired, this information is passed through shared XAML schema context.
trans-unit.target: Eventuelt denne virkemåten er sendes denne informasjonen gjennom delte XAML skjemaet kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The XML whitespace concepts are not robust enough to apply to XAML, and are typically ignored by XAML readers.
trans-unit.target: XML-mellomrom konsepter er robuste nok til å bruke XAML og ignoreres vanligvis XAML lesere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if writers that are processing the XAML node stream can write `xml:space="preserve"` in output; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:space" name="xml:space" href=""></xref> attributes cannot be written in nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forfattere som behandler XAML noden dataflyten kan skrive `xml:space="preserve"` i utdataene. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:space" name="xml:space" href=""> </xref> attributter kan ikke skrive i nodene.
